title: 5Ksana_HandMade
author: 5Ksana_HandMade
content: Bitcoin Mind➡Nothing can be bought for more than a bit of human and freedom. ➡Do not trust anything, that can think independently, if you don't understand, where its brain is.Material: -   piece of fabric;-   beads;-   sequins;-   crystal;-   metallic theards;-   wood frame .Painting size: width 35 cm., height 41 cm .Shipping from Free (EMS) (Shipping Worldwide)P2P lightning market - auction is running https://plebeian.market/auctions/5A[/size]

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Just wanna jump in and say I really like this one. What's really cool is the shape of your lines drawing the head also reminds me of a fingerprint.

comments.author: 5Ksana_HandMade

What's really cool is the shape of your lines drawing the head also reminds me of a fingerprint.Thank you! This is a collection of my artworks - the uniqueness of Bitcoin!
